title: Heralds on Horseback
description: a piece form the tapestry cycle woven for Marie de\' Medici, The Stories of Queen Artemisia, based on an epic account by Nicolas Houel; woven in the Faubourg Saint-Marcel Manufactory of Mark de Comans and François de la Planche, between 1611 nd 1627; warp undyed wool, 5½-7 ends per cm., weft dyed wool and silk, 28-40 ends per cm.
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
